Reviews.Title: Great LIGHT little computer with BIG buttons
Reviews.Author: J. A. Chenoweth "J C"
Reviews.Content: I would sell the Win8 I have now, but I need Win8 for work. So I sell the Win7 which isn't being made anymore! Many older people I think will have trouble with Win8 and want to go back to Win7 - and be searching for those computers, not wanting to compromise their new Win8 laptop by uninstalling 8 and installing a copy of Win7. Bad idea... Win8 computers are built differently.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Celeron processor B815 Features a 2MB L3 cache and 1.6GHz processor speed.
2GB DDR3 memory, 320GB hard drive (5400 rpm), Multiformat DVD±RW/CD-RW drive, Multiformat media reader
14" high-definition display, UMA graphics with HDMI output, Built-in 0.3MP webcam and microphone
Built-in high-speed wireless LAN (802.11n),  Built-in 10/100/1000 Mbps Fast Ethernet LAN, 1 USB 3.0 and 1 USB 2.0 port
Microsoft Windows 7 Home Premium Edition 64-bit operating system preinstalled
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS X44H-BBR4 14"-Inch Laptop (Brown)
